refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_truePing enables or disables true ping calculation. When enabled, ping is calculated by averaging the timestamps of commands sent by clients. This is a better way of calculating latency between the client and server. Though it does not affect actual lag or performance, ping numbers will usually be higher with this turned on. Keep this in mind when kicking players for high ping. This has no impact of any kind on antilag support.
